description: Play on words with the English alphabet.
title: Alphabet Woe
n_1: Tom, looking puzzled, talks to Jen while holding an alphabet book.
c1_1: I can't figure out this last letter.
n_2: Tom flips through the book, his confusion growing.
c1_2: All except for one, I know them.
n_3: Jen looks at Tom, waiting for his response.
n_4: Tom's expression lightens as he gets the joke.
